content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a court case in ljubljana regarding the division of assets between two exspouses the case started on july 9 2018 and ended on december 4 2021 lasting for a total of 3 years 4 months and 25 days the total value of the assets involved is estimated to be 100000 eur including real estate properties a garage business premises and funds in a bank account the division of these assets was determined as 45 for the plaintiff and 55 for the defendant the court considered the principles of the marriage family relations act and certain sections of the civil procedure code in making its decision the court ordered the defendant to provide documents authorizing the registration of the plaintiffs share in the immovable property garage and land the defendant was also required to pay the plaintiff a sum of eur 471354 each party is responsible for bearing their own costs the court considered the income and contributions of each spouse in determining the division of the coowned property the court partially upheld the applicants claim and ordered the division of the property and the registration of their share the court also made a judgment regarding the payment of money the court allowed the addressing of property issues during ongoing litigation under specific circumstances the court determined the shares of the coowned property to be 45 and 55 for the parties involved the court considered the costs of the proceedings based on the civil procedure act the judgment was mostly in favor of one party but had some unresolved aspects the resolution of the dispute was seen as fair and took into account the interests of both parties the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit required information and payment of court fees the document was dated december 14 2021 in ljubljana
